EmailTemplate.name: NCS Ambassador May 2016 Opportunities (LNE)
EmailTemplate.subject: NCS Ambassadors - fresh new opportunities!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hey {!Contact.FirstName},
As one of our valued NCS Ambassadors, we just wanted to let you know about some amazing opportunities you can still get involved in!
1. NCS Ambassador Phone Party:
Hang out with other NCS Ambassadors Get trained on top customer service tips Get on the phone to upcoming NCS 2016 participants Use your experience to get them excited for the summer! Help yourself earn a TCS Award!
The Phone Party will be happening during the next half-term on Tuesday 31st May from 14:00 - 17:00 in Kentish Town. If you're interested, fill in THIS FORM (https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1LmhEiJeVjcvLUS4fUHpwAgOZcEBFN16qB1bXZ-SoAzY/viewform) and we'll give you a call back to discuss it further.
2. NCS 2016 Information Evenings:
Share you NCS experience with the parents/guardians of upcoming 2016 participants Let them know all about your time on the programme and what their young person can expect Help yourself earn a TCS Award!
Information Evenings take place on a regular basis throughout the summer. If you're interested in attending one or more as an NCS Ambassador, email karel.morris@the-challenge.org for more information.
Thanks to everyone who has helped spread the word of NCS already this year. We hope to see you again soon!
